task.title: Save Content to Asset Library
task.shortdesc: Save content from the Social Search tab to save content for use in Apps.

step.cmd: View content details for the asset.
Click +Save to save the item to the top level of your Asset Library.
step.stepresult: Once the item has been saved, the button will change to Add to Folder, allowing you to locate it within the Library, if desired.
